DOC.brief_title: Phase 3 Study Evaluate Efficacy Safety DW-1030 Eperisone HCl Acute Back Pain Patients
DOC.criteria: Adult males/Females age 18 year Patients symptom Acute skeletomuscle myospasm Back pain Patients Pain VAS Value 40 mm Visit 2 Subjects voluntarily legal guardian agree write consent Patients Back pain cause spinal spondylosis , spinal stenosis , fracture , cancer , severe arthritis , osteoporosis , sciatica , infection Muscular patient myositis , muscular atrophy disease , increase muscle tone , myasthenia gravis Patients take invasive procedure epidural injection spinal stimulation cure back pain within 6 month screen point Patients take passive physical therapy ionphoresis within 12 hour screen point Patients severe GI tract disorder , heart disease , hypertension Patients take NSAIDS within 24hours screen point
